title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Tyler, Julian, and Joey
description:
Tyler, Joey, and Julian team up again to ask and try to answer the question, "Can Social Media Be Used For Good?"

“Plugged-In: The True Toxicity of Social Media”
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jVprI6_P8GE

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
